doc.field: - V.A.G. Kredit Bank GmbH, the credit bank subsidiary of Volkswagen AG [VOWG.F], said it was optimistic for 1987 after raising turnover and balance sheet total in 1986. V.A.G., Which finances the purchase of new and used cars for VW customers, said 1986 profits met expectations but gave no details. Financing turnover rose by 4.2 billion marks to 24.4 billion in 1986. Balance sheet total increased by 228 mln marks to 2.84 billion.
